title: Wet Tissues and Wipes Market – Technavio Publishes Global Forecast & Analysis
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Aug 21, 2015, 21:02 BST - UK Markets closed Wet Tissues and Wipes Market – Technavio Publishes Global Forecast & Analysis Press Release : Technavio Research – 5 hours ago 
LONDON--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- 3M Co, Clorox Co., and Kimberly-Clark are three key vendors highlighted in a new Technavio report 
Technavio has published a new report on the global wet tissues and wipes market ,which is expected to grow at a CAGR of almost 6% from 2015-2019. 
Wet tissues and wipes market segmentation including application, technology, packaging, and geography 
Technavio’s report analyses the solutions and products offered by market vendors and presents a comprehensive breakdown in terms of market segmentation for different applications, including personal care, household, and industrial. 
Additionally, analysts have segmented market projections by key geography, and also by technology, focusing on spunlace, airlaid, wetlaid, spunlaid, needlepunch, and others. 
“Consumers are switching to eco-friendly and natural personal care products as they are not only safe for the environment but also for the skin. The high demand for eco-friendly wet wipes is another trend that is expected to improve market growth during the forecast period,” says Faisal Ghaus, Vice President of Technavio. 
Wet tissues and wipes: Market scope and calculation of market size 
This report covers the present scenario and growth prospects for the global wet tissues and wipes market from 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report has taken into consideration revenue generated from the sales of global wet tissues and wipes manufactured by the vendors in the market. 
Industry analysis includes:
